name: JOHN BIRCH SOCIETY
description: Educational and advocacy organization focused on Constitutional government.
sampleDescriptions: We advocate for following the Constitution, Ending the Federal Reserve System, Promoting Free Trade, and Promoting the exiting of the United States from the United Nations.
